vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of Israel before the Monarchy, first mentioned at Rut.1.2;
son of: Elimelech (H0458) and Naomi (H5281);
brother of: Chilion (H3630); married to Ruth (H7327)
§ Mahlon = "sick"
son of Elimelech by Naomi and first husband of Ruth
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
瑪倫 这个陽性專有名詞 人名在希伯來文的意思是 "有病的"
以利米勒的兒子由拿俄米所生,也是路得的第一任丈夫
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
玛伦 这个阳性专有名词 人名在希伯来文的意思是 "有病的"
以利米勒的儿子由拿俄米所生,也是路得的第一任丈夫
